goal: allow the user to determine how much rain has accumulated at their location in the last 24 hours

prompt: Is rain expected at my location in the next 6 hours?
goal: allow the user to determine if precip will fall in the coming hours, forecast query

prompt: How much rain fell at my location on date/time?
Will my soccer game get rained out this evening?

prompt: When is it forecasted to rain again at my house?
goal: use forecast precip rate or max reflectivity and/or accums to see if rain is forecasted in the next 3 days. If not, swap to GFS for days 4-14
